page.title: 09Role of Chairman
page.content: IN HIS THIRD YEAR AS CHAIRMAN OF THE FESTIVAL COMMITTEE. HE ENJOYS THIS WORK TREMENDOUSLY AND SEES HIS ROLE AS THAT OF CO ORDINATOR, ENCOURAGING PEOPLE TO ATTEND MEETINGS AND PERSONALLY SUPPORTING AS MANY OF THE EVENTS AS POSSIBLE. MR CHARLETON CREDITS THE SUCCESS OF RECENT YEARS TO A COMBINATION OF THINGS - THE HARD WORK OF THE SECRETARY MRS. GRANT, THE MONTHS OF ORGANISATION , AND THE VERY GOOD WEATHER ENJOYED DURING THE LAST TWO SUMMERS. THE ONE EVENT WHICH HE THINKS IS MOST POPULAR IS THE TALENT CONTEST. MANY PEOPLE TAKE PART AND THERE IS ALWAYS A LARGE CROWD OF SPECTATORS TO ENCOURAGE THE CONTESTANTS. AS TO THE FUTURE, MR CHARLETON WOULD LIKE TO SEE MORE INVOLVEMENT FROM BUSINESSES AND MORE PEOPLE COMING FORWARD WITH IDEAS TO ASSIST THE COMMITTEE.
